import React, {useState } from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import { Button ,Modal, Form, Card } from "react-bootstrap"; /** * @author * @function Admin **/ const Admin = ({movie}) => { const [newMovie,handelMovie]=useState([{name:"",imdbRating:"",category:"", image:""}]) // delete Movie const deleteMovie= (id)=>{ axios.delete(`http://localhost:4000/posts/${id}`) .then(response=> console.log(response) ) .catch(err=>err) } const handelChange = (e)=>{ const {name,value}= e.target //SettingsInputAntenna({...addedmovie,[name]:value}) handelMovie({...newMovie,[name]:value}) console.log("hhhhhhh", newMovie) } // Add movie const addMovie=(e)=>{ e.preventDefault() axios.post("http://localhost:4000/posts",newMovie) .then(response=> console.log(response) ) .catch(err=>err) } const [show, setShow] = useState(false); const handleClose = () => setShow(false); const handleShow = () => setShow(true); return(
Movies

handelMovie({ ...newMovie, image: e.target.value }) } placeholder="Poster of the movie / serie" /> handelMovie({ ...newMovie, name: e.target.value }) } placeholder="Title of the movie / serie" /> handelMovie({ ...newMovie,category: e.target.value }) } placeholder="Plot of the movie / serie" /> handelMovie({ ...newMovie,imdbRating: e.target.value }) } placeholder="imdbRating of the movie / serie" min="1" max="10" step="0.1"/>
{movie.map(el=>
{el.name} {el.category} {el.imdbRating}
)}
) } export default Admin
